response.overview: India is a high school senior living in Brooklyn, sheâ€™s gotten a full scholarship to Brown University and is a model student, good daughter, fun best friend and loving girlfriend. On the outside, she seems to be living the teenage dream. However, it is all a lie. Internally, she is tormented, and hides a secret that threatens to end her most important relationships. She finally gains the courage to reveal her double life but discovers something that shatters her world completely.  www.LateExpectationsFilm.com.
response.title: Late Expectations
